ihatha tharunayan sudu wan mangin paharagena gos shri lanka nawika nauka parakrama aayathanaya pihiti chaithya pare "pittu bambuwa" namin handunwana sthanaye 2008 wasare agosthu masaye sita 2009 wasare marthu masaya dakwa sampath munasinha saha di.ke.pi dasanayaka yana niladharin ge adhikshanaya yatathe nithiwirodhiwa randawa thabagena thibe. 2009 wasare marthu masaye sita mayi masaya dakwa kalaya thula ema tharunayan 11 dena kolambain ragenawith di.ke.pi. dasanayaka saha mandalika nagenahira buddhi lesa katayuthu kala luthinan komadoru sumith ranasinha yana niladharin ge adhikshanaya saha palanaya yatathe kriyathmaka wu wishesha buddhi anshaye samipa adhikshanaya thula thrikunamalaya nawika kandawure ‘gansayid ‘ namathi bhugatha kandawure nithi wirodhi lesa randawagena sita thibe.

lokayata mulinma minis bomba sankalpaya hadunwa dun koti thrasthawadin lankawe ahinsaka samanya janathawa dahasganan maradamu athara kanthawan ha daruwan balahathkarayen thama hamudawata badawagaththa. 2009 di me ruduru thrasthawadin sahamulinma parajaya kota siyalu shri lankikayange manawa himikam surakinnata ape wirodara hamudawata puluwan una. 2011 di me manawa himikam kawunsalayama shri lankawa thrasthawadaya parajaya kirima agayakaramin yojanawak sammatha kala.
meya wikashaya arambaune 2015 juli masa spayik nalikawa magini.
